title: Real-world evaluation of novel eye drop bottle sensors: Cloud-based AI support for eye drop adherence
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Hitoshi Tabuchi, Kazuaki Nishimura, Masahiro Akada, Tomohiro Ishikami, Tomoki Shirakami, Naotake Kamiura, Yoshiaki Kiuchi
